title: Keep your iPhone charged all day with this magnetic power bank for just $27
content:
Macworld

If you’re always on the go and always worrying about your battery life, a portable power bank will do wonders for your peace of mind. The Iniu MagSafe-compatible Portable Charger can be the perfect addition, especially as it’s just $27 at Amazon, a savings of 33 percent off its $40 MSRP. This portable powerhouse will simply magnetically attach itself to your phone and take care of filling up your battery—a seamless experience.

This magnetic charger has a capacity of 10,000mAh, which will handle at least one full charge on your device and have some leftover juice there for later on. This is the perfect solution for all those concerts where you’re taking tons of videos, or all those hikes when you want to take pictures of all the butterflies and views.

In addition to its wireless capabilities, you can also charge your device using a USB-C cable, reaching a maximum of 20W of power, which is pretty awesome. So, if you have $27 extra in your pocket right now, the Iniu Portable Charger can be the perfect purchase so you can keep your phone going all day long.
